EOSIO.name: ENJOY
EOSIO.description: ENJOY.BET is a platform for trusted, profit sharing and high performance gaming experiences based on the EOS.IO blockchain. It solves the problems of traditional online gaming platforms and other online cryptocurrency casinos, including high fees, slow recharge/cash out and lack of trust. Our goal is to create the largest cryptocurrency gaming platform with platform token holders and share the platform's profits. We welcome everyone to join our community and build and grow together. We believe that value is ultimately created by our users, not just our team.

EOSIO.name: EOSTiger
EOSIO.description: EOSTiger is a classic entertainment platform based on the EOS.IO blockchain， rules are written by Smart Contracts.It is a collection of classic games with different senses, such as slot machines, Texas hold 'em, roulette, and blackjack.

EOSIO.name: EOS Max
EOSIO.description: SLOT and DICE on blockchain, all results can be verified. 100% of all game profit is distributed to holders of our MAX token.

EOSIO.name: Carbon Wallet
EOSIO.description: Multicurrency wallet with fiat on-ramp

EOSIO.name: HorusPay Market
EOSIO.description: EOS-based decentralized Global Payroll Portal that allows companies to exchange private encrypted secured data with international payroll vendors using the Blockchain.

EOSIO.name: EOSFun
EOSIO.description: EOS crash game

EOSIO.name: Nebula
EOSIO.description: Building decentralized apps

EOSIO.name: WORBLI

EOSIO.name: CryptoMeetUp
EOSIO.description: Cryptomeetup is the world's first decentralized event platform powered by EOS.IO blockchain technology!

EOSIO.name: FarmEOS
EOSIO.description: FarmEOS is the world's first DApp gaming eco-platform that combines game mining, Bancor and price dividend weight. PoB（Proof of Bancor) and DoP (Dividend of Price) are also the new mining modes pioneered by FarmEOS team.

EOSIO.name: Se7ens
EOSIO.description: Interactive Dice Game

EOSIO.name: Bloks
EOSIO.description: Full featured Block Explorer and Toolkit for EOSIO Blockchains

EOSIO.name: EOS Books

EOSIO.name: EOS Forum

EOSIO.name: Everipedia

EOSIO.name: EOS Sports Bets
EOSIO.description: P2P Sports Betting

EOSIO.name: Wallet for EOS
EOSIO.description: Wallet for EOS is a smart tool to check the EOS Token Balance and transferring of EOS tokens. Now you can check your EOS balance in a user-friendly platform.

EOSIO.name: BetDice
EOSIO.description: BetDice is the largest gaming platform on EOS blockchain. Users can earn DICE tokens from playing, and then get hourly dividends from staking. Both the platform and the token are based on user-centered design, which gives our users the best gaming experience.

EOSIO.name: Voteos.info
EOSIO.description: The purpose of this site is to help the EOS community develop a way to discover the wishes of the tokenholders; where there is agreement and where there is controversy, based on the amount of support a given proposal attains. Here, you can let your voice be heard and your tokens be counted on any issue. You can show support for any proposal or comment, or start your own initiative to see if it is widely supported! Join us in our effort to help the EOS better communicate, with on-chain discussions, which can lead to referenda, worker proposals, changes to the constitution, system contracts or simply gauging the support for your ideas. Use your stake to make your opinion count!

EOSIO.name: Super Dice
EOSIO.description: Super Dice is a single six-sided die game by SP studio. Join the game and have fun.

EOSIO.name: EOS World
EOSIO.description: Own the world on EOS blockchain

EOSIO.name: eoshub
EOSIO.description: UX-focused EOS toolkit service.

EOSIO.name: Trybe
EOSIO.description: Trybe Web Wallet

EOSIO.name: BET24
EOSIO.description: Roll the dice on the EOS blockchain platform

EOSIO.name: BTEX
EOSIO.description: BTEX是EOS上的通证交易所，将上币、撮合、结算全部放于链上，做到交易所功能全上链。BT是平台代币，通过持有BT享有相关权益，包括手续费100%分红、增值获利等。

EOSIO.name: EOSDAQ
EOSIO.description: EOSDAQ is an EOS-based on-chain DEX, providing the safest and most user-friendly platform to trade EOS-based tokens.

EOSIO.name: 0xWarriors
EOSIO.description: Combining multiple blockchains in the perfect synergy between technology and games in one epic world where players will decide who’s tougher! 0xWarriors is a Multi Blockchain-based game releasing on EOS first and Ethereum in the coming months! More cryptocurrencies to be added in the near future!

EOSIO.name: EOSGameBoy
EOSIO.description: EOSGameboy is retro-style dapp game that trustworthy and entertaining.
